# Alex Oguchi

I'm a graduate student in Business Analytics at UC San Diego with a background in economics, international business, and data science. My work focuses on applied machine learning, data analysis, and building comprehensive analysis on data.

This site highlights selected projects in:
- Data visualization (D3.js, Tableau, Svelte)
- Machine learning (Scikit-learn, PyTorch)
- ETL pipelines and data engineering (SQL, Postgres, Snowflake)
- Data Analysis (Python, Pandas, Numpy, Statsmodels)

View my [projects](projects.qmd), learn more [about me](about.qmd), or visit my [GitHub](https://github.com/raoguchi).
